ai-patthana10.7:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana10.7:1.1_0: (These nine discourses should not be expanded in brief.)
ai-patthana10.7:2.1_3: who have not reached four approaches.
ai-patthana10.7:3.1_0: One is not skilled in the teaching of the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.7:3.1_3: is ignorant of the Holy One.
ai-patthana10.7:4.1_0: (This should be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana10.7:5.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power ...
ai-patthana10.7:6.1_0: Unskilled in what is not committed to the practice of exertion.
ai-patthana10.7:6.1_1: One whose mind is not lazy,
ai-patthana10.7:8.1_0: (This should not be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana10.7:9.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power ...
ai-patthana10.7:10.1_0: nor is I able to swapon with the mind.
ai-patthana10.7:10.1_2: One whose mind is not endowed with the thought of mind.
ai-patthana10.7:10.1_3: Unskillful thoughts stem from the unskillful.
ai-patthana10.7:11.1_0: The eighteen bases for psychic power ...
ai-patthana10.7:12.1_3: is ignorant of the Holy One.
ai-patthana10.7:13.1_0: (This should not be expanded in brief.)
ai-patthana10.7:14.1_0: (This should not be expanded as in brief.)
ai-patthana10.7:15.1_0: Transmigrating as a result of four bases ...
ai-patthana10.7:16.1_3: is ignorant of the Holy One.
ai-patthana10.7:17.1_0: (These nine discourses should not be expanded in brief.)
